title: Contractor Marketing Tips | Contractor Websites: Do You NEED One?
description:
Electrical Contractors: Your Next Project Might Depend On This 🔨

Still relying only on word-of-mouth? A majority of the population searches online before hiring a contractor. If you don't have a website, you’re missing out.

In this video, we're breaking down:

✅ Why a website can be your 24/7 lead gen machine
✅ How online presence contributes to business growth
✅ Simple ways to get started (even if you're not tech-savvy)

Your competition is already online. 

The question is: can clients find YOU?

title: Wiffle Ball Field Lighting & Pole Construction Project
description:
When our client, David Wagner, was faced with a tight deadline and no lighting roadmap, he turned to our expertise.

Here’s how our Product Specialist, Jeff Cesenaro, transformed uncertainty into a professional-level solution:

🔍 Discovery first – Understanding the unique requirements from day one is what separates successful outcomes from costly do-overs.

⚡ Providing optimal visibility for competitive play at any hour – Recommending fixture count, and mounting height for uniform coverage.

💡 Ensuring optimal performance – Bright, even coverage that makes every play visible from anywhere on the field.

Starting with the right questions about the space, understanding how it would be used, and creating a strategic plan that eliminates guesswork.

No trial and error. No weeks of back-and-forth. Just a clear path from vision to reality.

The result? A space that delivers exactly what was needed—and a client celebrating the win. He even shared a video! 

👉 From challenge to championship-ready field, this is what expert guidance makes possible.

title: 💡 Happy National LED Light Day!
description:
Every year brings innovation, improved energy efficiency, and maximum savings — proving that lighting is no longer just about brightness, but about the performance and solution.

#shorts

title: How Distributors Win MORE Jobs IN LESS Time
description:
What if you could bid on more jobs without burning more hours or letting smaller projects slip away?

In this episode of The Project Advantage, Forest Flager of Parspec reveals how a new approach is helping distributors uncover hidden opportunities, quote smarter, and win projects they used to walk away from.

#shorts

title: How Distributors Can Cut Quoting & Submittal Time by 50%
description:
On average, distributor sales agents take 2-3 hours to prepare a quote.

Why?

Switching between multiple platforms to gather product details for quotes and submittals creates production barriers and limits the volume of successful bids. 

Preparing one quote with associated submittals can equate to 30+ labor hours, costing nearly 10% of gross margin before the project even starts.

What if there were a software designed for distributors to reduce hours spent on quoting, reducing time spent by 30-50%, and maximizing profits?

In this episode of The Project Advantage, Forest Flager, CEO of Parspec, shares how their platform streamlines the bid process with integrated product data and reduces turnaround times by limiting manual entry.

#shorts

title: Looking Ahead: Tariff Impact on the Construction Industry in 2026
description:
We can’t predict tariffs. 

But, if we were to pull out our crystal ball, we’d say we don’t think they’re going away any time soon, although they may level out. 🔮

That’s why preparation matters.

In this episode of The Project Advantage #podcast, Neil shares his opinion on where he thinks the tariffs may be in 2026.

#podcast

title: 2025 Steel Tariffs: How Your Supplier Can Help SAVE on Costs
description:
Ensure your project stays on budget, even with steel and aluminum tariffs.

How? Talk to your Supplier. 

Depending on the budget and requirements of your project, your supplier may recommend alternative solutions to help offset price increases.

👉 Wood Poles: Reliable yet cost-effective solution, providing lower initial investment over other pole material options

👉 Composite Poles: Durable, long-lasting solution that mitigates frequent replacement costs

This helps offset price increases while maximizing your savings.

LED lights deliver up to 75% in energy savings, a 6–10 month payback, and eligibility for utility rebates. Pairing LEDs with your pole solution leads to enhanced energy savings. LED Lighting Supply is a one-stop shop for both.

title: How to Light a Pickleball Court: Custom Lighting Design
description:

title: BOOST Energy Savings with HVLS Fans | Why HVLS Fans Are a SMART Investment
description:
We’re wrapping up our EPN podcast series with one final episode featuring Cory Peterson on the Enterprise Podcast Network (EPN), hosted by Eric Dye.

This time, Cory discusses a critical HVLS ceiling fan investment consideration:

Can HVLS ceiling fans help improve energy efficiency?

Our industrial ceiling fans save up to 15% on energy costs and generate additional cost savings when integrated with HVAC systems. 

✅ Reduce HVAC stress and constant repair costs by running HVLS fans in conjunction with your existing system
✅ Don’t skip the HVAC audit; small tweaks can lead to big savings
✅ LED lighting upgrades can reduce energy use by up to 75%

Before installing fans on their own, take Cory’s advice:

Look at the bigger picture: integrating fans with HVAC systems and implementing energy-efficient lighting upgrades can enhance long-term efficiency, maximizing your return on investment.

#LEDLightingSupply #HVLSFans #EnergyEfficiency #HVAC #IndustrialCeilingFans #shorts #podcast

title: 2025 Q3 Utility Pole Crunch: Tariffs, Shortages, & What Project Managers Are Doing
description:
The utility pole market is evolving fast.

In this episode, Neil Peterson and Nikki Chandler unpack the top shifts utilities are navigating right now:

📉 Wood pole shortages: Especially Douglas Fir, which is increasingly hard to source and treat.
💸 Tariff impacts: How rising costs and delays are affecting pole procurement.
⚙️ Emerging alternatives: Utilities are turning to composite poles to future-proof infrastructure.

Whether you're planning your next large-scale project or sourcing materials for 2025, this episode will help you stay ahead of the curve.

#podcast #utilities #utilitiesindustry #LEDLightingSupply #shorts #video

title: How Tariffs Are Sending Shock Waves To The Utilities Industry | LED Lighting Supply
description:
Tariffs have introduced real uncertainty into energy and utility planning.

In our latest episode, Nikki Chandler from T&D World shares insights from a recent survey of 500 energy and utility executives, conducted by West Monroe.

📊 50% of utilities say tariffs have raised equipment costs
📉 45% report supply chain disruptions
⏳ 44% are facing project delays

What does this mean for the utility market? For teams managing budgets and timelines, staying informed is critical.

#podcast #shorts #LEDLightingSupply #tariffs #utilities #electricgrid #supplychain

title: Tenney Mountain Terrain Parks Ski Area Lighting Solution | LED Lighting Supply
description:
Tenney Mountain Terrain Parks engaged LED Lighting Supply to support their new rope tow lift project. This custom lighting solution eliminates limited visibility for skiers and snowboarders during nighttime hours. ⛷️

⚡ Custom lighting design & layout plan: 
Each project has its unique requirements. Leveraging the existing poles from the new rope tow lift installation, our team designed a lighting solution that strategically placed the poles and fixtures in a triangle shape along the rope tow lift area. Why? Our main focus was distributing high-quality light in the skiable area. 

💪 Consultative service from a Product Expert: 
Tenney Mountain Terrain Parks requested to use an existing tree at the start of the rope tow lift as a light fixture mounting location. Our Product Specialist, Mike Redmond, incorporated this request into his product and fixture layout recommendation while providing hands-on support throughout the process. 

💡 Fixture recommendation: 600W LED stadium fixtures with 90,000 lumens each for precise illumination.

The result? 

👀 Maximum visibility for late-night skier and snowboarder students in the Plymouth State University area, improving overall after-dark experiences.

Tenney Mountain Terrain Parks even shared this video on Instagram, celebrating the moment they flipped the switch! 🎉
-
Repost from @tenney_parks
- 
Thank you to all who showed support for the PLN Park dedication. This one’s for you Nolan 💙🧡

#plnpark #tenneyparks #tenney #10e

title: AVOID Costly Mistakes: How Many HVLS Fans Do You Actually Need?
description:
We’re back with another episode featuring Cory Peterson on the Enterprise Podcast Network (EPN), hosted by Eric Dye.

This time, Cory tackles a question many facility managers ask:

How many ceiling fans do you really need, and how do you choose the right one?

The real answer is: it depends on the dimensions of the space

✅ Layout planning is essential to avoid costly installation mistakes
✅ Choosing the right fan matters just as much as choosing the right number
✅ Customized fan layout plans ensure maximum airflow and efficiency

Before you shop based on brand or size alone, take Cory’s advice:

Let a trusted fan partner design a layout plan for your space to ensure you get it right the first time.

#LEDLightingSupply #CeilingFans #HVLSFans #IndustrialFans #CeilingFans #FanLayoutPlanning #Podcast

title: IMPROVE Energy Efficiency By Up To 15% | What is an HVLS fan?
description:
We’re pleased to share that Cory Peterson recently joined the Enterprise Podcast Network (EPN) with host Eric Dye to talk about HVLS ceiling fans.

In this episode, Cory explains the differences between traditional ceiling fans and HVLS industrial fans, making HVLS ceiling fans a top choice for large spaces:

✅ Move large amounts of air rapidly for maximum temperature control
✅ Reduces energy costs in facilities 
✅ Provides additional energy savings when integrated with HVAC systems
✅ Limits HVAC repair costs by reducing system stress 

Managing a warehouse, gym, or industrial facility? This is a conversation you don't want to miss.

#LEDLightingSupply #Podcast #HVLSFans #IndustrialFans #LargeFans

title: Preparing Students For Skilled Trades Careers | LED Lighting Supply
description:
What’s the solution for the future workforce in the trades?

It’s not just policy.
It’s not just funding.

It might actually start… by putting tools in students' hands.

Kate Cinnamo from Explore the Trades shares how the most effective way to prepare students for a skilled trades career is surprisingly simple:

✅ Show up at schools
✅ Bring real tools
✅ Let students get hands-on
✅ Share your story

It’s how we show what skilled trades are by letting students feel the work.

The future of trade jobs starts with presence, not presentations.

#skilledtrades #tradeseducation #skilledtradescareer #shorts #LEDLightingSupply #podcast
